## Self-sufficiency
* Nudging towards self-sufficiency: new norm for Ed posts. 
* Tell us how you tried to troubleshoot. Examples:
    * “here is the chatgpt prompt I tried” 
    * “here is the help page I found that is relevant my error/issue but I don’t understand xyz in it."
